snippet: Mobile vendors, more common in the city, are bringing Cajun food, specialty pizzas and hearty soups and sandwiches to unexpected locations in the suburbs.
abstract: Food trucks, more common in the city, are bringing Cajun food, specialty pizzas and hearty soups and sandwiches to unexpected locations in the suburbs of Westchester County (Metropolitan/Westchester).
